snippet: Stocks closed higher as investors welcomed some encouraging economic news. Overseas markets also rose amid hopes of a breakthrough in Greece’s discussions with its creditors.
abstract: Stocks rise on positive economic news, tempered by slump in energy companies and utilities.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher as investors welcomed some encouraging economic news. Overseas markets also rose amid hopes of a breakthrough in Greece’s discussions with its creditors.

headline.main: Market Modestly Higher After Encouraging Economic News
headline.print_headline: Indexes Rise, but Energy Shares Slump
